Title: Titanic
Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates
Plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

Title: Inception
Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page, Tom Hardy
Plot: A thief, who steals corporate secrets through use of dream-sharing technology, is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

Title: A Clockwork Orange
Actors: Malcolm McDowell, Patrick Magee, Michael Bates, Warren Clarke
Plot: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem - but not all goes according to plan.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 8 wins & 17 nominations.

Title: Breaking Bad
Actors: Bryan Cranston, Anna Gunn, Aaron Paul, Dean Norris
Plot: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's financial future.
Awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 132 wins & 218 nominations.

Title: Game of Thrones
Actors: Peter Dinklage, Lena Headey, Emilia Clarke, Kit Harington
Plot: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, plans to return after thousands of years in the North.
Awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 185 wins & 334 nominations.
